byline.contributor: Vindu Goel contributed reporting from San Francisco.
byline.original: By MIKE ISAAC and DAVID STREITFELD

abstract: Ouster of Ellen Pao as chief executive of social media site Reddit followed torrent of Internet criticisms, some sexist and racist, calling for her dismissal after she fired well-liked Reddit employee Victoria Taylor; Pao's rapid fall from grace is likely to reignite charges that bullying and harassment are out of control on Internet, and that Silicon Valley's problem with gender and ethnic diversity in work force continues.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Pao, the interim chief executive, will remain as an adviser to the board. She had been under intense scrutiny from members of the company’s devoted web community.

headline.main: It’s Silicon Valley 2, Ellen Pao 0: Fighter of Sexism Is Out at Reddit
headline.print_headline: It’s Silicon Valley 2, Ellen Pao 0: Fighter of Sexism Is Out at Reddit

snippet: Ms. Pao, the interim chief executive, will remain as an adviser to the board. She had been under intense scrutiny from members of the company’s devoted web community.
